reviews.review: Крч игра топ, кто говорит что она так себе, тот в неё не играл, а я в неё играл, а потому скажу что она топ. Сюжет класс, графика класс, персы класс, я тоже класс (ибо я купил эту игру). Так шо, покупайте смело, рекомендую)

전편보다 기묘하고 음습한 느낌이 더 강해짐. 퍼즐의 종류도 다양해지고 난이도도 올라가서 도전욕구를 자극시켜준듯함.
코옵모드는 친구가 있어야만 할 수 있음. 그런데 친구가 없잖아
그래도 솔로 캠페인만큼 재미있는게 코옵 캠페인이기 때문에 주변 지인을 불러서 같이 하자.
One of the greatest games of all time, would recommend this to anyone who wants a fun gaming experience

Welp, here goes nothin; Single player is fine, Co-op is good. Single player consists of plot holes, annoying characters, and a score I barely remembered. On the other hand, It's graphics are great for their time, and the mechanics play well combined with gameplay. For co-op, me and my friend only found enjoyment out of noclipping and killing each other in maps. 6/10

(This is an updated review, since I gave Co-op too much credit from February 12)

Good graphics that I can run on my gumball wrapper of a PC, very good story and amazingly hilarious dialogue, and fun new elements that really make you [b] feel [/b] like you've been asleep for 9999999
esta buenardo como diria la nimu

Portal 2, del 19 de Abril de 2011, es la segunda parte del juego de ingenio homónimo. Mucho mas grande, el argumento comienza 50 mil años después del primer Portal, después de haber sido criogenizada en una cámara de relajación, donde Wheatley, el módulo de personalidad nos da una serie de indicaciones para movernos y finalmente volver a dormir. Posteriormente somos despertados, pero esta vez la habitación donde nos encontramos, está seriamente deteriorada, con el contador de tiempo fallando. Siguiendo las indicaciones de Wheatley, somos conducida hacia las cámaras de pruebas donde se desarrolló el primer Portal (pero con las instalaciones semidestruidas e invadidas por la vegetación). Tras localizar la pistola de portales, iremos cerca del lugar donde se encuentra el cuerpo inanimado de GLaDOS., que se reactiva y nos reconoce inmediatamente, regresandonos al circuito de cámaras de pruebas..
Es notable la psicopatía de la I.A., en sus comentarios hirientes… Finalmente, descubre que intentar matarnos, tan solo le ha traído problemas y es mucho más sencillo simplemente dejarnos ir, por lo que decide perdonarnos y liberarnos en un ascensor que nos envía hacia la superficie.
this game is cool as fuck. that's it, really.
Great game! I have played the OG Portal too and I can definitely say that this game is wayyyy more challenging and has a ton more levels than Portal has.
best game ive ever played, good story mixed with hard chalenges
excelente juego, sobre todo el modo de juego cop
Fucking Fantastic game. Fun with friends as well and the story is impeccable.
Beautiful! game such a good game!
mt bom compra caetano pelé ta torcendo pra chover ontem não gostei me da o fortnite

the best puzzle game i have ever played
This game is like portal 1 but even better!

This is one of my all time favourite games!
It's got tons of puzzles and its still fun and doesn't feel outdated despite being and old game.
Puzzles can be quite tough sometimes but I still find it fun to do.
It also has a nice simple plot to go with it, which I think is great! No need for something too complex.

This game is great for people who like slightly challenging puzzles and flinging themselves across a room.

Portal 2 é um jogo de puzzle com uma história muito boa que te envolve do inicio ao fim, e com um sistemas de portais semelhante ao primeiro jogo e tivemos adicões de nas mecanicas de gameplay com os novos gels que foram implementados no jogo, com o gel azul que faz nós pularmos até partes inacessíveis com o pulo normal com a shell. temos tambem o gel laranja que nos deixa mais rapidos que o normal e por ultimo temos o gel de pressurizacao que permite nós criarmos portais onde normalmente não podemos criar um! Na minha opinião esses vinte reais foi muito bem gasto no game! Vale a Pena super recomento!
Es excelente y si ya jugaste portal 1 este es mejor, muy divertido
девиз кооператива: ДА ТЫ ЗАЕБАЛ ПОД МЕНЯ ПОРТАЛЫ СТАВИТЬ, ДАВАЙ ИГРУ ПРОХОДИТЬ БЛЯТЬ

This is a great game. I recommend playing both this one and the first one. I love the scope of this game, how massive Aperture labs feels in this game. Definitely recommend.

I played Portal and right after that Portal 2 and I just want to say that this game is one hell of an adventure, the characters, the puzzles and the overall plot where amazing, half way in the game I was just saying "amazing" on everything that was happening infont of me. This game is mainly for people who enjoy puzzle solving with sprinkles of character goofiness in between every puzzle but I think people with different tastes can still go frou this game with a smile on there face.
good game not hard but not easy

买爆！！！
优秀的游戏，不论是单人剧情还是双人合作都非常有趣。
单人模式氛围渲染非常到位，有适当的压迫感，但不会过于压抑，解谜难度适中，想象力丰富（尤其是结局，非常惊艳），很有趣。
通关单人模式后数年，才和朋友一起玩双人模式，发现联机的可玩性也很高。还没有体验过玩家自制地图，有兴趣可以尝试。
画面，音乐，游戏性在我心目中都是非常优秀的，再加上AI时不时的插科打诨，游戏体验非常好。
可以说是我接触的最优秀的游戏了！

Отличный представитель головоломок, который захватывает в свой простенький сюжет, который все равно является хорошим. Много как сложных, так и простых говоломок. 
 Я прошел игру без подсказок и читов. Всем советую!
